name: Star Avenger
overview:
It came from the arcade program that places us in command of a ship that must go through tunnels. cities, mountains and valleys with the incessant danger of unpredictable rockets, which at the most unexpected moment launch in vertical takeoff towards us.
The game, although most of you already know it, consists of fighting, through nine different scenarios against powerful armies of aliens that will try to cut us off towards our objective: the enemy command base. Achieving it is tremendously difficult and complex, but with a good dose of skill, experience and patience there is nothing impossible.

The hard combat begins as soon as the enemy planet arrives. There, hundreds of anti-aircraft missiles will try to impede our passage while we. In addition to getting rid of them, we must recover the fuel lost during the trip or we will never reach the enemy base.

Later the caverns will appear, forcing us to intensify our attention in flight rather than shooting at the enemy. It will not take long to arrive after traversing the last cave tunnel. It will be the first volley of aliens made up of huge cyber birds.
